name: Pokémon Fire Blast
overview: About: Improvements at Kanto region, plus a special section with the Sevii Islands and their leaders. Complete and working 100% functional. Features and Improvements: • Possibility of flying to all parts correctly. • Leaders with revenge at Kanto. • Improved graphics, more colorful & elegant. • System clock automatically walk with 5 changes. • System clock automatically walk with 7 weather times. • New sprites renewed virtually all. • New sprites include: tiles, trainers sprites, sprites pokemon, several graphs. • Ability to have all Pokemon are more likely to capture others that were previously very rare (Hoenn & Johto). • Sounds remastered and enhanced, more aligned to what was Pokemon Yellow. • Similarity to anime occurrences & new rivals accorded to Pokemon Yellow. • Leaders reinforced, more difficult. • More interesting attacks. • New objects, new main characters, history, places, music, events. • Much more!
